instructions: On your computer, open a Web browser to download and install the Windows version of Google Play Music Manager . You can download the latest version at https://play.google.com . Follow the screen instructions to complete installation, and then log on to your Google Play Music account. When prompted, start importing your WMA music files to your Google Play Music library. On your phone, open the Google Play Music app. Tap Drawer button > Music library . Navigate to the WMA music file, and then tap it to start playing.
